name: OR_LOG_LN_SCD
description: This table contains the line IDs (ORM) for the SCD Information of the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the SURGICAL LOG table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCD_ID
columns.description: List of line record IDs, each of which stores the information for a single procedure and its related diagnoses.
